channel.title: Welcome on ACM Special Interest Group on Software Engineering (SIGSOFT)
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on ACM Special Interest Group on Software Engineering (SIGSOFT)

item.title: SIGSOFT CAPS
item.description: SIGSOFT Travel Support and Childcare Assistance at Conferences - CAPS # ACM SIGSOFT provides registration support for students and researchers to attend the virtual ICSE'21. If you are interested, please submit your complete application online before the deadline shown on the application form.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Chair: Thomas Zimmermann # Microsoft Research One Microsoft Way Redmond, WA 98004 Phone: +1-425-703-8450 chair_SIGSOFT@acm.org Vice Chair: Marsha Chechik # University of Toronto chechik@cs.toronto.edu ACM Program Director for SIGSOFT: James Peeples # ACM Headquarters 1601 Broadway, 10th Floor New York, New York 10019-7434 USA Tel: +1-212-626-0603 Fax: +1-212-302-5826 peeples@hq.acm.org Social Media Chair: Sridhar Chimalakonda # Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Tirupati, India http://researchweb.iitt.ac.in/~sridhar_ch ch@iittp.ac.in Refer to https://www.
